22g PROTEIN
No-Bake

NO-BAKE CHOCOLATE PEANUT BUTTER BARS

A classic no-bake bar with a rich chocolate and peanut butter flavor, packed with 22g of protein.

22g
Protein
250
Calories
15m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs20g
Fat15g
Fiber5g
Sugar8g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 240g creamy peanut butter
  • 120g honey
  • 120g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 90g rolled oats
  • 60g dark chocolate chips

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prepare the pan

Line an 8x8 inch pan with parchment paper.

2

Mix wet ingredients

In a large bowl, mix together the peanut butter and honey until well combined.

3

Add dry ingredients

Add the protein powder and rolled oats to the bowl and mix until a thick dough forms.

4

Press into pan

Press the dough evenly into the prepared pan.

5

Melt chocolate

Melt the dark chocolate chips in the microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring until smooth.

6

Top and chill

Pour the melted chocolate over the dough and spread evenly. Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before cutting into bars.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
